metadata.synopsis: Generic tiefling hanging around camp after the party. Only shows up when a named tiefling is missing from the scene.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - goto 163.75, 23.23, 551.75- Kill Bex and Danis (Ctrl+Shift+K).- oe readyattackonden- oe attackondentieflingvictory- SetGlobalOsirisFlag DEN_AttackOnDen_Event_TieflingPartyInvitation- Go to camp. Skip through the dialogues.- In camp find Vatas. Talk to him.

1.speaker: Vatas
1.text: Kind of you to open your camp to us. We'll have to return the favour in Baldur's Gate.
